Makes a DOM element, with children, representing a top_region from a TopRegionMatch.

Parameters:
topRegion The TopRegionMatch to make an element of.
format The coordinate format to use.
reply The document to make the element in.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If indent.
buf Top region data added to make crc later ( optional ).
Returns:
The element with the top region.
